text: wahuwa alladhi anzala mina l-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi nabata kulli shayin fa-akhrajna min'hu khadiran nukh'riju min'hu habban mutarakiban wamina l-nakhli min talʿiha qin'wanun daniyatun wajannatin min aʿnabin wal-zaytuna wal-rumana mush'tabihan waghayra mutashabihin unzuru ila thamarihi idha athmara wayanʿihi inna fi dhalikum laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
